languages.text: {n}Вокс гневно шипит:{/n} "Мирянин, мыслить — не та функция, ради которой ты существуешь. Ты спасаешь близких, удерживая их под прицелом, и веришь, что прозрение приносит выжигание глаз. Кажется, что автор демагогического учения, которым ты был обманут, хотел поиздеваться над твоим скорбным умом".

{n}Pasqal's vox hisses furiously,{/n} "Layperson, cognition is not your primary function. You are saving your kin by holding them at gunpoint and believe that burning their eyes will grant them sight. It is evident that the author of the demagogic teaching that confused you meant to make a mockery of your deplorable intellect."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс гневно шипит:{/n} "Мирянин, мыслить — не та функция, ради которой ты существуешь. Ты спасаешь близких, удерживая их под прицелом, и веришь, что прозрение приносит выжигание глаз. Кажется, что автор демагогического учения, которым ты был обманут, хотел поиздеваться над твоим скорбным умом".

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox faucht voller Wut:{/n} "Laie, Erkenntnis ist nicht Eure primäre Funktion. Ihr rettet die Euren, indem Ihr sie mit der Waffe bedroht, und glaubt, das Ausbrennen ihrer Augen würde sie besser sehen lassen. Es ist offensichtlich, dass der Urheber der demagogischen Lehre, die Euch verwirrt hat, sich einen Spaß mit Eurem bemitleidenswerten Intellekt erlauben wollte."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses furiously,{/n} "Layperson, cognition is not your primary function. You are saving your kin by holding them at gunpoint and believe that burning their eyes will grant them sight. It is evident that the author of the demagogic teaching that confused you meant to make a mockery of your deplorable intellect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Vox faucht voller Wut:{/n} "Laie, Erkenntnis ist nicht Eure primäre Funktion. Ihr rettet die Euren, indem Ihr sie mit der Waffe bedroht, und glaubt, das Ausbrennen ihrer Augen würde sie besser sehen lassen. Es ist offensichtlich, dass der Urheber der demagogischen Lehre, die Euch verwirrt hat, sich einen Spaß mit Eurem bemitleidenswerten Intellekt erlauben wollte."

languages.text: {n}Un sifflement furieux jaillit du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Profane, votre fonction principale n'est pas la connaissance. Vous sauvez vos proches en les menaçant d'une arme et espérez les aider à voir en leur brûlant les yeux. Il est évident que l'auteur de l'enseignement démagogique qui a semé le trouble dans votre esprit ne cherchait qu'à se moquer de votre piètre intelligence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses furiously,{/n} "Layperson, cognition is not your primary function. You are saving your kin by holding them at gunpoint and believe that burning their eyes will grant them sight. It is evident that the author of the demagogic teaching that confused you meant to make a mockery of your deplorable intellect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sifflement furieux jaillit du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Profane, votre fonction principale n'est pas la connaissance. Vous sauvez vos proches en les menaçant d'une arme et espérez les aider à voir en leur brûlant les yeux. Il est évident que l'auteur de l'enseignement démagogique qui a semé le trouble dans votre esprit ne cherchait qu'à se moquer de votre piètre intelligence. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音愤怒地嘶吼着。{/n}“认知根本不是你的主要功能，教外人士。你用枪指着你的亲人，以为烧掉他们的眼睛就能让他们重见光明，以此来拯救他们。这很明显，那个散播异端邪说，让你困惑不已的人，不过是想嘲弄你可悲的智力罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses furiously,{/n} "Layperson, cognition is not your primary function. You are saving your kin by holding them at gunpoint and believe that burning their eyes will grant them sight. It is evident that the author of the demagogic teaching that confused you meant to make a mockery of your deplorable intellect."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音愤怒地嘶吼着。{/n}“认知根本不是你的主要功能，教外人士。你用枪指着你的亲人，以为烧掉他们的眼睛就能让他们重见光明，以此来拯救他们。这很明显，那个散播异端邪说，让你困惑不已的人，不过是想嘲弄你可悲的智力罢了。”

languages.text: {n}怒ったようにパスカルのヴォクスが鳴る。{/n}「俗人よ、認識とは根源的機能ではないぞ。あなたは銃口を突き付けることで同胞を救い、彼らの目を焼くことで目が見えるようになると信じている。あなたを惑わせたその扇動的な教えの著者は、その嘆かわしい知能をからかおうとしたのであろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses furiously,{/n} "Layperson, cognition is not your primary function. You are saving your kin by holding them at gunpoint and believe that burning their eyes will grant them sight. It is evident that the author of the demagogic teaching that confused you meant to make a mockery of your deplorable intellect."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒ったようにパスカルのヴォクスが鳴る。{/n}「俗人よ、認識とは根源的機能ではないぞ。あなたは銃口を突き付けることで同胞を救い、彼らの目を焼くことで目が見えるようになると信じている。あなたを惑わせたその扇動的な教えの著者は、その嘆かわしい知能をからかおうとしたのであろう」

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal silba intensamente,{/n} «Laico, el conocimiento no es su función principal. Está salvando a sus parientes apuntándoles con un arma y pretende que recuperen la vista quemando sus ojos. Es evidente que la demagoga que le enseñó a obrar así pretendía burlarse de su limitada capacidad cognitiva».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses furiously,{/n} "Layperson, cognition is not your primary function. You are saving your kin by holding them at gunpoint and believe that burning their eyes will grant them sight. It is evident that the author of the demagogic teaching that confused you meant to make a mockery of your deplorable intellect."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal silba intensamente,{/n} «Laico, el conocimiento no es su función principal. Está salvando a sus parientes apuntándoles con un arma y pretende que recuperen la vista quemando sus ojos. Es evidente que el demagogo que le enseñó a obrar así pretendía burlarse de su limitada capacidad cognitiva».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu öfkeyle tıslıyor.{/n} "Avam adam, belli ki idrak işlevini yerine getiremiyorsun. Akrabalarına silah doğrultarak onları kurtardığına ve gözlerini yakmanın onlara görüş kazandıracağına inanıyorsun. Kafanı karıştıran demagojik öğretinin müsebbibinin amacının, acınası aklınla alay etmek olduğu çok açık."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox hisses furiously,{/n} "Layperson, cognition is not your primary function. You are saving your kin by holding them at gunpoint and believe that burning their eyes will grant them sight. It is evident that the author of the demagogic teaching that confused you meant to make a mockery of your deplorable intellect."
